duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage general office surveying services and assist in managing the survey team.
Compile calculations, prepare and review surveys, manage clients, and assist in growing the division.
Lead in the preparation of topographic survey, boundary survey, and right-of-way engineering documents.
Review surveying documents prepared by staff, process strong planning and organizational skills with the ability to work under pressure.
Complete field work if necessary to support crews in meeting deadlines, provide continuous training to staff, and adapt to evolving technology.
Provide as-built data in GIS format for company clients.

education_certification.credential: Professional Land Surveyor registration in Indiana, Bachelor's degree in Surveying or related field (Master's preferred)
